text:
ERODE

Nandha Engineering College: Innovation Day 2016, P. Kasiannan, correspondent, AET Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Nasiyanur, inaugurates, 9.30 a.m.

Bannari Amman Institute of Technology: NSS special camp, 10 a.m.; laboratory inauguration, Panchayat Union Elementary Schools, Kaliyappagoundanpudur and Vettuvanpudur, 6.30 p.m. Erode Sengunthar Engineering College: NSS camp, inauguration by District Collector S. Prabakar, Gundri, 2 p.m.

Velalar College of Engineering and Technology: Inauguration of VCET FOSS Centre by Ramesh Subramaniam, CEO, Flycart Technologies LLP, Coimbatore, and M. Raja, ECE, IRTT, Erode, 9.30 a.m.

SALEM

District Administration: Farmers grievances redress meeting, V. Sampath, District Collector, presides, Collectorate hall, 10.45 a.m.

City Municipal Corporation: Council meeting, Mayor S. Soundappan presides, 11 a.m.

Periyar University: Department of Food Science and Nutrition, visiting faculty programme, valediction, M. Manivannan, Registrar, chief guest, 4 p.m. Knowledge Institute of Technology: Campus interview by Wipro Technologies, 10 a.m.; Knowledge Fest 2016, a talent competition for school students, 10 a.m.

Dhirajlal Gandhi College of Technology: Workshop on ‘towards creative programming,’ T.N. Raj Vignesh, hear-R and D and partner Salieabs Electrronics Engineers LLP, resource person, 10 a.m.

Sri Ganesh College of Arts and Science: Department of Computer Science and Applications conducts seminar on ‘Mobile Ad-Hoc networks and its implications,’ 10 a.m.

Shri Sakthikailassh Women’s College: Youth Red Cross conducts AIDS Awareness programme, 1 p.m.

Tamil Nadu State Agricultural Marketing Committee: Coconut and copra auction, Uthamasolapuram regulated market, 11 a.m.

National Book Trust and New Century Book House: National Book Festival book exhibition, Bose Maidan, 9.30 a.m. and 9.30 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Federation of Associations of Private Schools in Tamil Nadu: Motivation programme for teachers, Minister for School Education K.C. Veeramani and Minister for Industries and Transport P. Thangamani participates, Paavai Educational Institution, 9.30 a.m.

Paavai College of Engineering: Campus recruitment by INFAC India Private Limited, 10 a.m.

Department of Handlooms and Textiles: Handloom exhibition, Sri Namagiriamman Thirumana Mandapam, Kulakarai, 9.30 a.m.

Mahendra Engineering College: Department of Management Studies conducts investor awareness programme, R. Krupa Sankar, Assistant Manager, National Stock Exchange of India Limited, Chennai, key note address, 10.30 a.m.
title: engagements
